name: NuboCoder – Beaver Builder Carousel
author: César Siancas

sections.description:
Highly customizable carousel for Beaver Builder using Slick Carousel,
for more information about the configuration options please visit the site.

The plugin’s features are:

  • Fully responsive
  • The user can setup different breakpoints and configuration options for different screen sizes
  • The default item information is: a title, image, content and a link
  • User is able to use shortcodes to display an item or all the items in the carousel
  • Possibility to use custom HTML code for the items
  • Comes with a simple basic style
  • Tested on Beaver Builder (pro version) Version 2.5.5.2

For questions or custom requirements please contact the plugin’s author at zed.1985@gmail.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the nubocoder-bb-carousel folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The plugin will appear in the Beaver Builder modules
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Added more allowed html tags for the HTML slider item type

1.0.1

  • Bug fix

1.0.0

  • Initial release
sections.reviews:
So glad I found this plugin!

By allbarben on March 15, 2024

Simple and does exactly what I need it to do! I've used it on a bunch of sites already and have added it to my plugin arsenal :)
